DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to provide data on the lipid profile of the Tenon's capsule in Human glaucomatous eyes and to establish possible relationships with the short term outcome of filtration surgery.
DOC.criteria: Glaucoma Eligibility for surgery Patients without Glaucoma
DOC.keyword: Assessment of lipid profile in Tenon's capsule in patients with Glaucoma
